item.description:
Bangzheng (Benjamin) Li

+1-203-601-0833 | liben@mit.edu
Cambridge, Massachusetts - 02139

INTRODUCTION

I am a senior at MIT majoring in mathematics whose current interest is algebra and number theory.

EDUCATION

  • Massachusetts Institute of Technology
    Undergrad
    GPA: 5.0/5.0
    2022 – Present
    Cambridge, MA

  • Christian Heritage School
    High School
    2018 – 2022
    Trumbull, CT

AWARD

  • Hartley Rogers Jr. Prize
    MIT
    The best paper award in the Summer Program in Undergraduate Research (SPUR)
    August 2024

ACTIVITIES

  • Undergraduate Research Opportunities Program Plus (UROP+)
    MIT
    June 2025 – August 2025
